text: The Erlun Story House () is a historic building in Erlun Township, Yunlin County, Taiwan. ==History== The story house building was originally constructed as the Erlun Police Station in 1899 during the Japanese rule of Taiwan as the first police station in Yunlin, then part of Tainan Prefecture. In 2005, the building was designated as a historical building by Yunlin County Government. It was then reopened as Erlun Story House in 2014 after NT$8.45 million renovation. ==See also== * List of museums in Taiwan ==References== Category:2014 establishments in Taiwan Category:Art museums and galleries in Taiwan Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1899 Category:Former police stations in Taiwan Category:Museums established in 2014 Category:Museums in Yunlin County
title: Erlun Story House
